Title: Charles-Hubert Paris Gold-Plated Quartz Pocket Watch
Description: Charles-Hubert, Paris Gold-Plated Quartz Pocket Watch Features: 14k gold-plated brass 48mm hunter case with a matching curb chainWhite dial with date displaySwiss parts quartz movementDeluxe gift box Product Details: Product Dimensions: 4.9 x 4.4 x 1.5 inchesShipping Weight: 6.4 ouncesItem model number: 3517Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S. International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More Description Fine craftsmanship marks this timepiece with distinction. Designed with classic pocket watch portability and function in mind, this go-anywhere time- teller features a lustrous brass-tone finish and 14k gold plating. The white dial offers crisp contrast against black italic Arabic indicators. Matching curb chain. White dial. Date display. Swiss parts quartz movement. Comes with deluxe gift box. 14k gold-plated. 1.89 in. Dia. The Charles-Hubert, Paris Gold-Plated Quartz Pocket Watch 3517 offers a modern twist on a much loved classic style. This pocket watch features a 14K gold-plated brass Hunter case with matching curb chain; generously sized white dial with three black-tone hands and black-tone Arabic numeral hour markers; and a push crown for easy opening. Precise and reliable thanks to Japanese quartz movement, this Charles Hubert original arrives in a deluxe blue gift box.
